Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory748.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Charles', 3: '...My wife and I eventually managed to get this bar up and running.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: "Well? It's quite a touching love story, isn't it?", 4: '1'}
{2: "It's nothing but an ordinary story!", 3: '7', 4: "Sob... I'm so touched...", 5: '8'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: "Really? Maybe it's my storytelling skills, but I thought it was very moving—actually, it was absolutely life-changing for me! Hahaha.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: 'See? I knew the commandant would understand!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: "Here's a free refill on me!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Will do! Thank you!', 3: '11'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lei', 3: 'Dad, I want to get some lamb skewers from next door.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Charles gets out some money and gives it to Lei.'}
{3: 'Charles smiles gently as he watches Lei run off.'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: 'Time really does fly. Even Boss has got someone.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: 'I know that quite a few people in Support Force have a crush on her.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: 'Wonder how many will be heartbroken when they learn the news.', 4: '1'}
{3: "There it is—Bridget's playful look!"}
{2: 'Charles', 3: 'Ah, I see.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: "I apologize. I shouldn't have said that.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Charles puts down a small plate of roasted peanuts and leaves quietly.'}
{3: 'Bridget raises her glass and takes another big gulp of her drink.'}
{3: 'A mischievous grin spreads across her face.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'What were you going to say, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: '"Actually, our relationship is exactly what Charles thinks it is!"', 3: '40', 4: '"Actually, we\'re just friends."', 5: '46'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "My, my, Commandant. You're bolder than I thought.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm none other than the marvelous Gray Raven Commandant!", 3: '44'}
{2: "There's not a soul in Babylonia who hasn't heard of me!", 3: '45'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Look how cocky you are!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Oh? Just friends?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "You're breaking my heart!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "I guess I shouldn't invite you out anymore.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Who knew the Gray Raven Commandant could be so... heartless!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Bridget puts away her playful expression once she's done teasing."}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Jokes aside, we...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bridget suddenly moves closer without finishing her sentence.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'We can totally take it up a notch.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Then quickly sits back down again.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Ahem. Forget I said anything. Bottoms up!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Golden liquid swirls in her glass, and when the glasses clink, white bubbles rise like ocean waves before flowing down Bridget's throat."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory748.jpg'}
{3: 'Everyone is still chatting and laughing when thick smoke suddenly begins seeping in from a window at the back.'}
{3: 'Alarms start blaring as guests scramble to their feet, panicking.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staff', 3: "Boss, we've got thick smoke coming in from next door!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: "Ms. Zhang's place?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staff', 3: "No, the other one—Nicholas' Grill!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: 'Lei is there!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Leave it to me!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Commandant, evacuate the customers. Charles, find a fire extinguisher. You there, server—yes, you—contact the fire department and Star of Life!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bridget gives out orders before dashing toward the exit.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Make way! Support Force Captain Bridget coming through!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory459.jpg'}
{3: 'You evacuate all the civilians before turning to look at the burning building.'}
{3: "It's been nearly two minutes since Bridget dashed inside. Worse yet, the fire is growing more intense."}
{2: "Don't worry. Bridget will get her out safely.", 3: '91'}
{3: 'From the corner of your eyes, you see three people sprinting toward you.'}
{1: '1', 2: '"Sand Fox"', 3: "What's going on?", 4: '1'}
{2: '"High Wall"', 3: "We're from Support Force! What's the situation?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The door flies open with a thunderous bang.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Bridget bursts out of the burning shop with Lei in her arms.'}
{1: '1', 3: "A flash of sorrow crosses Bridget's eyes as she watches the father and child embrace."}
{3: 'Bridget turns to face the three from the Support Force.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Perfect timing.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: '"High Wall", "Sand Fox", "Lizard"! Attention!', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'The fire appears to have been caused by aging electrical circuits. As Support Force, we will go in and attempt to contain the blaze until the fire department arrives.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Understood?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The four of them turn to run. Charles, standing to the side, takes half a step forward before stopping.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Charles looks down to find Lei quietly tugging at his pant leg, looking up at him.'}
{3: 'Bridget notices the two.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'All civilians and non-Constructs must stay back and evacuate immediately!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: '【kuroname】, please look after them.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory459.jpg'}
{3: 'By the time everything has calmed down, the night is far along.'}
{3: 'Thankfully, no one was hurt thanks to the quick response.'}
{3: 'Bridget is speaking with the firefighters in the distance.'}
{3: 'She shakes hands with the firefighter before walking back toward us.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Charles', 3: 'Thank you, Boss.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Charles comes over with a drowsy Lei in his arms.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Don't mention it. Your problems are my problems.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "I'll get you some canned electrolytes. It's getting late, and Lei's tired—you should head home.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bridget picks up a pack of electrolytes, puts some money on the counter, and turns to look at you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Would you come with me, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sounds good!', 3: '169'}
{3: 'You walk out of the shop, and after a moment Charles calls out from behind.'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: 'Come back soon. VIP discount for life—'}
{3: 'Bridget raises her hand and gives a thumbs-up without turning around.'}
